title: Techland
content: Techland S.A. is a Polish video game developer and publisher founded in 1991 by Paweł Marchewka. It developed Call of Juarez (2006) and its prequel Call of Juarez: Bound in Blood (2009), as well as Dead Island (2011) and Dying Light (2015).[2] The company is headquartered in Wrocław in western Poland and has offices in Wrocław and Warsaw.[3]
